modules.description: This module traces HTTP requests and manages distributed tracing contexts for Cohttp Lwt servers. It provides functions to wrap request handlers with tracing spans, propagate trace context via custom headers, and manually manipulate tracing state. Concrete use cases include instrumenting incoming HTTP requests with OpenTelemetry spans and propagating trace context across service boundaries in microservices.

This module integrates OpenTelemetry tracing with Cohttp Lwt clients and servers, enabling distributed tracing by automatically capturing HTTP request and response metadata, injecting trace context into outgoing requests, and propagating span information across services. It provides wrappers for Cohttp Lwt client modules and functions to trace incoming requests, manipulate tracing state, and propagate context via headers. Concrete use cases include instrumenting HTTP clients to inject trace headers, wrapping server request handlers to create and propagate spans, and correlating cross-service requests in microservice architectures. The module combines client instrumentation with server-side tracing to provide end-to-end visibility into HTTP-based interactions.
